_sText:
I was sick of how small gg_aim_shotty was so I based mine off of it (aka, built the entire thing myself, not like it was a complicated design), making it somewhat larger, better cover, more lighting, and added a basement to it.  

I used some brushwork from the cbble sdk map, but modified them all around to get it to work.  Was a good learning experience as well.

has 60 spawn points..  I wouldn't suggest that many people, but hey.. its there..  also has buyzones incase an update messes up GunGame.
